CustomField.description: Formula to check availability and is available for nightly scheduled flow to remove members that should not be in the program
CustomField.formula: text(Program.Category) == text(Partner.Type) && text(Program.Country__c) == Partner.BillingCountry && if(text(Program.Sub_Category__c) == 'Spiff Type' , text(Program.Spiff_Type_Specific__c) == text(Partner.Spiff_Type__c), if(text(Program.Sub_Category__c) == 'Certification' , Program.AV_Certified_Only_Members__c == Partner.AV_Solutions_Partner__c, true))
CustomField.label: programEligible
